evidence.claim: Kompassion utilizes AWS for their cloud infrastructure.
The company implements FHIR standards for health data exchange.
Integration patterns include RESTful services for data interoperability.
Kompassion complies with HL7 standards for health information processing.
Utilizes Google Cloud Platform for scalable hosting solutions.
